panic.title: Panic Button
panic.instructionText: Press the button below and help will arrive soon.
panic.toastActivated: Panic alert activated. Sending emergency signal...
panic.alertDeactivatedMessage: Panic alert was deactivated after {{seconds}} seconds. Are you okay?
panic.shareLocationMessage:
Your current location: {{coords}}.
Approximate address: {{address}}.

Do you want to share this location with your emergency contacts?
panic.locationErrorMessage: Could not get your location. Check permissions.
panic.smsEmergencyMessage: I’m in danger! I need help immediately.
panic.smsFailToast: Failed to send panic alert via SMS.
panic.smsCancelMessage: False alarm. Panic alert has been canceled.
panic.smsCancelToast: False alarm notice sent to your contacts.
panic.smsSafeToast: Safety confirmation sent to your contacts.
panic.smsLocationToast: Location shared with your emergency contacts.
